name: Abelo
short_description: Abelo is a free (open source) web management system for retail administration of enterprises. It's possible to manage customers, workers, products and suppliers, make supply control, works like point of sale, beyond financial enterprise management.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
